patthana24.5:1.1: Nahetuṃ nosaññojanaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu saññojano dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana24.5:3.1: Nahetuṃ noganthaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu gantho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana24.5:5.1: Nahetuṃ nooghaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu ogho dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana24.5:7.1: Nahetuṃ noyogaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu yogo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana24.5:9.1: Nahetuṃ nonīvaraṇaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca hetu nīvaraṇo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
patthana24.5:11.1: Nahetuṃ noparāmāsaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nahetu parāmāso dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṃkhittaṃ.)
